meanings.definition: The front part of the shank of an animal, especially a lamb or calf.
meanings.sent1: The foreshanks of the lamb were tender and flavorful.
meanings.sent2: The chef used foreshanks to prepare a delicious stew.
meanings.sent3: The foreshanks of the calf were so tasty, they made the other animals jealous.
meanings.sent4: She cooked the foreshanks with care, turning them into a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The butcher recommended the foreshanks for their rich taste and texture.

meanings.definition: The meat from the front part of the shank of an animal, used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: For dinner, we enjoyed a hearty meal of foreshanks.
meanings.sent2: The foreshanks added a savory flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally dropped the foreshanks on the floor, much to the dog's delight.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the cooking foreshanks filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: She seasoned the foreshanks perfectly, creating a mouthwatering meal.
